text_block_list.text: It was the day before the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: … Phoo.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, just look at that acceleration…! Narita Brian… 
There is no mistaking her quality.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
She's still rough around the edges, but that also means she 
still has so much more potential to unlock… I can't wait to see 
her performance in tomorrow's Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hoh hoh, the race is only tomorrow but it feels like a lot of eyes are already watching, huh? Though, that fires me up as well!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ma'am……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh! …You here to watch Brian too?

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
…… She really is monstrous, you know? 
… Are you really going to go toe-to-toe with her?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
For sure. And I better see you in the stands, too! 
I'll show ya a race to remember!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …… Why are you so concerned with someone like me, ma'am…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It really bugs me when those who could make me stronger 
just up and disappear. That's all there is to it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Alright, Trainer, stop gazing at Brian and come focus 
on our training! Gimme today's program!

Narita Brian looked to be a formidable opponent indeed, but… 
Hishi Amazon steadily continued to make improvements herself.

She was gifted with incredible adaptability backed by her 
superb sense for running. Our training bore fruit by the day, 
and her ability was constantly rising.

Our training came to an end here, as the next day 
had arrived and it was time for the race ——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
We're moving on to the final group of today's Selection Race! 
Everyone's eyes will no doubt be on Narita Brian, whose 
incredible natural talents have attracted plenty of attention!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
All horsegirls are in their gates, as we wait for the start… 
Selection Race number 11, 2000m on turf… and off they go!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian drops from fourth to fifth as the leader runs 
out far in front! She's staying calm back there!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
In 7th we find Hishi Amazon, keeping close tabs 
on Narita Brian as we complete a full lap!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Amazon, ma'am……

With the race still in the middle leg, Narita Brian had 
made an early move up to third place.
And then, approaching the fourth corner again ——

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll break free…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian! Narita Brian takes the lead! Three lengths, 
four lengths, Brian is taking off on her own!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hah… Not on my watch! I'm coming for yoouuuu!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon chases her from the outside!! 
Her stride is powerful! She's closing in on Brian!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Knew someone would come… but…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Further acceleration from Narita Brian!! Her speed is fearsome! 
She's trying to lose Hishi Amazon ——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ghraaaaaaaaaaaaaahh!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
But she won't go!! Hishi Amazon matches her speed up!! 
An intense battle is unfolding on the final straight!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …… Ma'am!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
(My chances are right here! Nothing about this is over!! 
I don't care if I lose and lose and lose some more!!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
(As long as you push to the bitter end, as long as you don't 
give in to yourself, the fight is far from over!!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Uhraaaaaaaaah!!
In the end, Hishi Amazon had to concede defeat to Narita Brian.

But her performance carried such power, was so inspiring 
to the audience, that no one would think twice about giving 
her a standing ovation……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Aaagh, flippin' heck, I lost!! But, well ——

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ubwuehgwubweeeeeeh…… Ma'aaaaam…!! That wahs… That waszh zo… so inspiriiiiing……!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, hey, horsegirls don't go crying like that. Look at you… 
So, whatcha think, still feel like dropping out?

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't even think about it, forget I ever said anything!! 
I've never felt more motivated! Even if I have to go back 
to basics, I'm gonna train my ass off!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
And I'll be… Someday, I'll be strong enough 
to take you on one-to-one, ma'am!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah, I'll be waiting!! 
…… Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hey, Am. ……That was fun. Let's do it again sometime.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hmph! Next time I'm gonna blow you away. 
You just wait, Brian!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… Heh.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon! I was thoroughly impressed by your strength 
and fighting spirit! Would you like to come train under me!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, I'm sorry, but in regards to that… I've already 
found my partner. Right, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Damn sure. I couldn't deny that your training program 
played a big part in being able to take on Brian, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You better let me have a bunch more intense battles, Trainer! … Hmm, Trainer does sound a bit stuffy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I know, how about I call ya Big T instead?
choice_data_list: Am I a rapper now? Or your bodyguard…?
Am I a rapper now? Or your bodyguard…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Like a giant protective bouncer, Big T? Ahhahahah, I dig it!! Well, just think of it as being on close terms.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: In any case… who am I going up against next, Big T?

That was the start of my journey with 
the bold and spirited Hishi Amazon.
